text: (widya 24-00 dharmaraja) palamu ardhaya: widya widyalaya 24 – 00 dharmaraja widyalaya palamu ardhaye men nowa dewana ardhaye di dharmaraja kridakayo dadi adhishtanayen yuthuwa tharagayata awathirna wu athara ehi prathipalayak lesa widya kridakayin hata tharagaye palamu warata pidanayak ella karamin siya idiripela kridakayin yoda ganimin siya palamu uthsahaka dinuma raskara ganimata samath wiya.

‘hudekalawa’ nam ketikathawen nisi kalata wiwaha praptha nowu wirasena nam paripalana niladhariyeku shyama nam thanaththiyaka lan weddi dakwana prathicharath ee nisama asarana bawe agadhayata ada watena ayuruth, atham witaka maya yatharthawadayata aasanna wemin wiwaranaya kara thibe.

dashaka dekakata aasanna kalayak ema wadawarjakayo thamanta yukthiya itukara ganimata wehesunaha.eda kamkaruwan maha parata ada damu, owunge ayithin mulumaninma kappadu kara damu eksath jathika pakshayata ada kamkaru ayithin pilibanda nangi sitinnata ho kimbaul kandulu helannata ho sadacharathmaka ayithiyak natha.kamkaruwanta siduwu warada 1994 dakwa niwaradi kirimata kamkaru janathawa wenuwen kimbaul kandulu helana kamkaru nayakayan yayi kiyaganna kisiwakuta nohaki wuyeya.1994 podujana eksath peramunu rajaya balayata pathwimath samanga ee ithihasagatha warada niwaradi kerini.

me pirisa sanwidhanathmaka lesa hasirunu bawath janatha wimukthi peramune ihala deshapalana kriyakarin me pirisa hasuruwa athi bawath aarakshaka amathyanshaya wetha thorathuru labi thibe.katunayaka aayojana mandala sewakayange wirodhatha wyaparaya siduwu awasthawe ema pradeshaye durakathana kulunu haraha huwamaru wu durakathana paniwidawalata sawandimen mema thorathuru helikara gatha haki wi atha.
inpasuwa thawath elle tharaga thorathura tharaga karana
kithunu tharunayeku pamanak nowa oonama tharunayeku tharuna wanne ohu pulul wa sithimata haki bawin yuthu wu wita bawa api me lipipela aarambhayedima sandahan kalemu.

mathiwarana kramaya wenas kirima yanu pasugiya janadhapathathiwaranaye di sidukala mathiwarana poronduwak.mathiwarana kramaya wenas kirima menma sima nirna katayuthu sidukirime di pera siduwu waradi nisa matath pida widinnata siduuna.mathiwarana kramaya wenas kirima siduwu paridima chayarupaya- rukmal gamage palath palana mathiwaranayata adalawa pasugiya da (09) parlimenthuwe sammatha wu panath thrithwayata kathanayaka karu jayasuriya mahatha eeye (12) athsan thabu ayuru.

nathinam obe aramuna itu nowewi.

obala wani karunika , iwasiliwantha niladharinge puhunuwak labapu nisa . …
indiya madhyama rajaya saha bihar prantha rajaya wiharasthana palaka mandalaya samanga ekwa wishesha aarakshaka salasmak kriyathmaka kara athi bawa sandahanya.

mekala pa්rasiddha wu puwathpath mema bhasha satana pilibanda wiwidha adahas pala kala athara eda dandagamuwa mantha්riwaraya wu eeriyagolla mahatha sinhala pamanak rajaye basa wiya yuthuyi yana yojanawakda parlimenthu kandayamata thani yojanawak lesa idiripath kaleya. 1955 nowambar 4 dina janatha patha්raya magin bhasha hatana pilibandawa wiwidha wartha idiripath kara thibuni.
sathi anthaye paththara gosipwalin mada khedima kara thibune wirawansaya.
wawanna kalin hithanna oone wikunanne kohomada katada kiyana eka.
“araෙgallage bed rum eke nayit lamp ekak wage la eliyak thibuna.

sinhala minihek obalage kandekata awith yamak miladi ganna puluwan thathwayak athi karaganna oone nam, samayata aadaraya karana muslim janathawagen mama illa sitinawa, ewani ratak godanagima sandaha gotabhaya rajapakshata chandaya pawichchi karanna kiyala.”
badu mila wadinam wadi wi thibenne kage aanduwa yatathe da?
api dakalath thiyenawa pare ehemath duwanawa gewathu madin oyala puhunuwim karanna .

rajanayaka - gampola krida amathyanshaye saha krida sanwardhana departhamenthuwe sanwidhanayen pawathi 43 wani jathika maha krida ulele (2017) marathan pirimi shurathawa uthuru mada palathe dammika arunasiri dinagath athara, kantha shurathawa basnahira palathe madhumali perera dina ganimata samath wuwaya.

sithe konaka ithiriwa thibu ekama eka balaporoththuwakin yuthuwa ha ee atha dadiwa alwa gathimi.

shuddhoththama piyathuma wishwa katholika sabhawe adhyathmika nayakayanan pamanak nowa lowa kudama rajya wana wathikana rajyaye rajya nayakaya da wana nisa radaguruthumanlage aaradhanawata amatharawa rajya nayakaya lesa ekala shri lanka prajathranthawadi samajawadi janarajaye janadhipathi garu. di. bi. wijethunga mathithuman wisin da, shri lankawata sapaminena lesa dewana juwam pawulu sasunisurananta aaradhana kala athara 1995 janawari masata yedi thibunu loka kithunu yowun dina mahothsawaya sadaha pilipinaye manila nuwara sita romayata aapasu wadina gamanedi prathamayen papuwa niw giniyawata da, dewanuwa ostreliyawata da gos shri lankawata sapath wana bawada shri lankawe paya 25 ka kalayak gatha karana bawada danum dun athara, 1994 apriyel masa 25 wana dina wathikana guwanwiduliya thulin shuddhoththama piyathumage lankagamanaya pilibada nila washayen danum dena ladi.

ee mahatha kiya sitiye me pilibandawa thorathuru soya balimak sidu kala yuthu bawath ewakata diwinaguma departhamenthuwe ihala niladharin diwayina pura mema wahanaya pilibandawa danuwath karamin wyapruthi aarambha kala bawaya.

itha thiranathmaka thindu rasak ganu labu ema raswima hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen eekabaddha wipakshaye nayakayan wana dinesh gunawardhana, wasudewa nanayakkara, dalas alahapperuma, udaya gammanpila, basil rajapaksha, raja kollure, thissa witharana, asanka nawarathna yana mahathwarunge sahabhagithwayen pawathwini.
emagin thorathuru danaganime ayithiya surakshitha kala.
dan api eekata muhuna dila inne.
24 paye pa්rawruththi prathamayen danaganna,
mewara janadhipathiwaranayedi hakmana lankawe palamu thanata genawa.
hamoma sinhalayata toku aninna hethuwak thibenawa.
samaharawita yanyawe ridmayak thaba ganima , hadawatha wenas karana bawa oba soyagannawa atha.
mulu bala aniyama idiriye owunwa hasthayin lawa maranaya thek paga damana ladi.
ehemath nathinam api saththunta karana dewal niwaradiyi kiyala oba hithanawada?
wenada wage no weyi.
ethuma dan wiweka suwayen pasuwenawa.esraj pamanak nowa ma hithanne sitharayada wadanaya karanawa!
aththenma matath thiyena prashnaya meka thama.

mulatiyana pradeshiya lekam kottasaye grama sewa wasam dahasayak sanwardhanaya kirimata rupiyal haya koti wisi thun laksha panas dahasaka mulya prathipadana wenkota athi bawa mulatiyana sahakara salasum adhyakshika pi. el. ayirangani mahathmiya pawasuwaya.me sanwardhana wyapruthi kriyathmaka kirime di aayojana prawardhana amathi lakshman yapa abewardhana mahathage pradhanathwayen saha mulatiyana pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi sunil alladeniya, mulatiyana pradeshiya lekam susantha aththanayaka yana mahathwarunge adhyakshanaya yatathe sidukirimata niyamithaya.palath nanguma wadasatahana yatathe grama sewa wasam sandaha mulya prathipadana beda wenkara aththe mese ya.pitawalgamuwa atambaegahawaththa margaya sanwardhanayata laksha hatharak da horapawita dakuna pathramulla margaya sanwardhanayata laksha hatharak, harapamulla nangenahira wilekoratuwa krushi marga sanwardhanayata laksha pahak da, neralampitiya malapalawa amune pathi bamma sakasimata laksha pahak wen kota thibe.mudaligedara bahukarya godanagillak idikirima deyiyandara prathamika widyalaye godanagillak idikirimata ruhunu udawa wyapruthiya kriyathmaka kirima kamiyape uthura saukhya madhyasthanaye piwisum margaya sanwardhanaya, gammadagama pasal mawatha konkrit kirima gombaddala sathipola nawatha aarambha kirima, gombaddala dakuna bahukarya godanagille ithiri wada awasan kirima, maduwala saha belpamulla kanishta widyalaye godanagili prathisanskaranaya, ransagoda dakuna sewa piyase wada kirima, ransagoda nangenahira bahukarya godanagilla idikirima, batadola kithsiripura margaya konkrit athirima yana sanwardhana wada sandaha me mudal waya kara atha.
